parameters.name: BoundingValues
parameters.description: Array of doubles specifying minimum and maximum diameter values with which each configuration is compatible

returns: True if the Smart Component is created, false if not
remarks:
For example, a component with these configurations:
TenInchDiameter
ThirteenInchDiameter
TwentyInchDiameter
might have a BoundingValues array of [
9,11,12,14,19,21], which specifies a +1 tolerance over each configuration parameter.
